name: Bug Juice
description:
After the apocalypse, all that’s left are cockroaches, safe in their bunkers. But wait, what’s that scratching sound?! The insects that survived are still outside in the wastelands and they need your help!

Save all the ants before you all mutate from the radiation.Too much radiation will zap these poor bugs.

Grab hearts to heal Roachie, but watch out: the bigger your party, the more mouths you’ll have to feed.

How to Play
  • Left & Right: move
  • Spacebar: jump (and double jump)
  • Up: jump off of a wall
Created for Ludem Dare 40

Game Jam Notes:

  • HTML: https://webthingee.github.io/LDJam40Game/
  • Completed in under 72 hours
  • December 5, 2017 6:25 AM : BUGFIX: changed one boolean value (one word)
  • Theme: The more you have, the worse it is.
  • Game Engine: Unity 2017.2.0f3
  • Music Creator: UJAM STUDIO and SUPER LOOPER
  • Sound Effects: Public Domain from freesounds.org
  • Graphics: MagicaVoxel, Photoshop and Sketch
